snippet.title: Panzer Corps 2 Axis Operations 1944 | in 2 minutes
snippet.description:
We are delighted to announce that Panzer Corps 2: Operations Axis 1944 is the first DLC that offers two entire campaigns that are completely separate and independent from one another. Like all previous DLCs, Panzer Corps 2: Axis Operations 1944 also adds 20 new scenarios and a new set of objectives, classified as Elite Objective.

🎮 Play on Steam 👉 bit.ly/3Wx1T8P 
🦎More info on Slitherine 👉  bit.ly/3DFLwOR
